video.title: Mighty Med
video.synopsis: Two comic book fanboys find a secret entrance to a hospital for superheroes and get jobs helping injured heroes, using their ordinary human skills.

episodes.synopsis: Two teenage comic book fanboys discover a secret entryway into a hospital for superheroes called Mighty Med and find a way to assist their idols.
episodes.title: Saving the People Who Save People, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The boys use their comic book knowledge to save a hero and land jobs while making new superhero friends and villainous enemies.
episodes.title: Saving the People Who Save People, Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Oliver creates a Frankenstein-inspired play to maintain his cover. Kaz fixates on a hero named Brain Matter who vanished from the comic book circuit.
episodes.title: Frighty Med

episodes.synopsis: When Skylar sinks into a state of depression, Kaz and Oliver try to lift her out of it by introducing her to the "normo" world.
episodes.title: I, Normo

episodes.synopsis: Annoyed with Oliver's newfound popularity and the big ego it's nourishing, Kaz uses a shrinking ray to cut him down to size.
episodes.title: Sm'Oliver's Travels

episodes.synopsis: Kaz plays a practical joke on Skylar, but she doesn't understand because there are no pranks in the superhero world.
episodes.title: Pranks for Nothing

episodes.synopsis: Kaz and Oliver meet Horace's cousin Timeline, a superhero whose power is the ability to see into the future -- and what he sees is not pretty.
episodes.title: It's Not the End of the World

episodes.synopsis: When Gus contracts a superhero illness, Oliver and Kaz sneak him into Mighty Med for treatment and are forced to pass it off as a normal hospital.
episodes.title: Evil Gus

episodes.synopsis: Oliver thinks that, like supervillains who are mistreated and humiliated during life, Alan had his surly disposition shaped by Horace's criticism.
episodes.title: Alan's Reign of Terror

episodes.synopsis: Kaz wants to apply for the job of Techton's sidekick, but when Oliver does something heroic, Techton selects Oliver instead.
episodes.title: So You Think You Can Be a Sidekick

episodes.synopsis: Just as Kaz makes up a reason to escort Oliver to his surprise birthday party, there's a security lockdown at Mighty Med.
episodes.title: Lockdown

episodes.synopsis: Kaz and Oliver are excited to find out the results of the recent employee evaluations in which Mighty Med's hero patients rank the staff.
episodes.title: All That Kaz

episodes.synopsis: Skylar introduces Kaz and Oliver to Experion, a teenage superhero and her longtime friend, but Oliver harbors jealousy and suspicions.
episodes.title: The Friend Of My Friend Is My Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Kaz presses the button on a wormhole transporter, revealing a hero from 1953 named Captain Atomic, whose battery is running low.
episodes.title: Atomic Blast from the Past

episodes.synopsis: Frustrated about being too young to buy a video game, Oliver takes a serum that makes him age, but he grows older far too quickly.
episodes.title: Growing Pains

episodes.synopsis: Oliver worries about working the overnight shift at Mighty Med because he's heard that the freakiest patients come out at night.
episodes.title: Night of the Living Nightmare

episodes.synopsis: Kaz becomes convinced that the high school gym teacher is actually Dr. Wrath, a supervillain who feeds on negative energy.
episodes.title: Mighty Mad

episodes.synopsis: Kaz starts a superhero fantasy football league, and in the ensuing chaos, Kaz and Skylar must save the Benjamin Franklin Bridge.
episodes.title: Fantasy League of Heroes

episodes.synopsis: Wallace purchases a machine that can turn someone into a perfect replica of someone else and uses it on Clyde, unleashing a villain named Catastrophe.
episodes.title: Copy Kaz

episodes.synopsis: Oliver and Kaz take a newly superpowered rock star under their wing and introduce her to the world of Mighty Med, but Skylar has objections.
episodes.title: Guitar Superhero

episodes.synopsis: Kaz finds a flash drive that he thinks is Oliver's study guide, but it turns out to be a digital jail storing a villain named Wi-Fi.
episodes.title: Free Wi-Fi

episodes.synopsis: When Horace complains that comic book sales are down, Oliver and Kaz offer to join the writing staff to help spice things up.
episodes.title: Two Writers Make A Wrong

episodes.synopsis: When Horace asks Oliver and Skylar to pet-sit for the shark he keeps in the aquatic wing of the hospital, the creature begins eating heroes.
episodes.title: Are You Afraid of the Shark?

episodes.synopsis: When the boys discover an all-powerful pen that can make any illustration drawn with it come to life, Kaz borrows it and leaves it at school.
episodes.title: The Pen Is Mighty Med-Ier Than The Sword

episodes.synopsis: The boys throw a party to celebrate their year-long friendship with Skylar, but their joy is dampened by news that Skylar's future looks very grim.
episodes.title: There's A Storm Coming Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The boys fight Skylar's nemesis to help her regain her powers; when a group of megavillains escape from prison, Mighty Max faces total annihilation.
episodes.title: There's A Storm Coming Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Oliver and Kaz are trapped in the emergency room with the Annihilator and Skylar, while Jordan and Gus take care of the comic book store.
episodes.title: How the Mighty Med Has Fallen: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: Kaz and Oliver attempt to sabotage the Annihilator and Skylar's plan using the powerful Crystal of Kreln.
episodes.title: How the Mighty Med Has Fallen: Pt. 2

episodes.synopsis: The boys work up a plan to penetrate the Annihilator's lair, gather his collection of superpowers and return them to the superheroes.
episodes.title: Lair Lair

episodes.synopsis: When the boys notice a few heroes displaying bizarre behavior, they suspect there could be a hospital mole working with the Annihilator.
episodes.title: Mighty Mole

episodes.synopsis: The guys pretend they don't know Skylar is evil, but complications arise when she asks Oliver to the school dance. Alan gets caught up in a prank war.
episodes.title: The Claw Prank Redemption

episodes.synopsis: Oliver and Kaz travel to Skylar's home planet, Caldera, to search for the Annihilator's former mentor, Hapax the Elder.
episodes.title: Do You Want to Build a Lava-Man?

episodes.synopsis: Hapax agrees to battle his mutant protégé. Evil Skylar realizes her powers are greater than the Annihilator's and she wants to rule the universe.
episodes.title: Storm's End

episodes.synopsis: A man claiming to be Kaz's future self warns that Oliver may be a future villain. Skylar learns that the superheroes hate her.
episodes.title: Future Tense

episodes.synopsis: While Oliver, Skylar, Alan and Gus are home working on a school project, Kaz is left behind at Mighty Med and must deal with an alien bug.
episodes.title: Stop Bugging Me

episodes.synopsis: To encourage new recruits, Horace lowers the bar for becoming a superhero. Oliver tries to brighten Skylar's mood by taking her to a dance tournament.
episodes.title: Less Than Hero

episodes.synopsis: After a pregnant superhero shows up at Mighty Med, Oliver steps up to care for her sack of valuable eggs, and must hide his "pregnancy" at school.
episodes.title: Oliver Hatches the Eggs

episodes.synopsis: When a tough-as-nails teen superhero takes a liking to Kaz, things get complicated. Skylar improves security to keep villains out of Mighty Med.
episodes.title: Sparks Fly

episodes.synopsis: Oliver works on rehabilitating Wallace and Clyde, thinking there is still some good in them. With Skylar's help, Kaz tries to turn into a superhero.
episodes.title: Wallace and Clyde: A Grand Day Out

episodes.synopsis: When superhero Key Keeper decides to retire, both of the boys want to step into his shoes. Oliver creates an online dating profile for his mother.
episodes.title: The Key to Being a Hero

episodes.synopsis: Horace hires Gulliver and Chaz after they stumble into Mighty Med, but the new "norms" may have an ulterior motive. Skylar installs a suggestion box.
episodes.title: New Kids are the Docs

episodes.synopsis: Suspicion runs rampant at school: Jordan is certain his new history teacher is really Captain Atomic and Stefanie thinks Skylar has a fake identity.
episodes.title: It's a Matter of Principal

episodes.synopsis: A vivid dream inspires a Tecton comic story idea for Oliver, but it creates more problems than he anticipated. Alan helps Horace with wedding plans.
episodes.title: Living the Dream

episodes.synopsis: Chase is severely injured when a villain steals his new energy source. Kaz, Oliver and the Lab Rats rush him to Mighty Meds.
episodes.title: Lab Rats vs Mighty Med: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Skylar, Kaz and Oliver try to locate a flash drive that holds valuable data; meanwhile, Alan begins family counseling for Oliver, his mom and Horace.
episodes.title: Thanks for the Memory Drives

episodes.synopsis: Kaz and Skylar look for an all-powerful energy source. Oliver asks the villain Megahertz to protect him from Mr. Terror's minions.
episodes.title: The Dirt on Kaz & Skylar

episodes.synopsis: While his mother prepares to marry Horace, Oliver hunts for Mr. Terror. The battle to keep villains away from the supernatural Arcturion begins.
episodes.title: The Mother of All Villains: Pt. 1

episodes.synopsis: The history of the Arcturion is revealed. Oliver is shocked by Mr. Terror's real identity. Kaz and Oliver acquire a special new ability.
episodes.title: The Mother of All Villains: Pt. 2
